revised_title: Samuel Pepys Commemoration Service: A Historical Event
tldr: The Samuel Pepys Commemoration Service was held on May 31, 1951, to honor the famous diarist. The event took place at the temporary Church of St Olave, Mark Lane, with the Lord Mayor and Sheriffs in attendance. The Royal Society was represented by Professor E. N. da C. Andrade, F.R.S., and the Address was given by R. C. Latham, M.A., on the topic of 'Pepys the diarist.'
